channel.title: Need help with my source
channel.description:
I have a dodian source and everytime i run it it's not working... Im wondering if any of you know why
Im running jre7 I have a windows XP and inside the source folder its
@title *your server name* @echo off
java -Xmx800M server
pause
That's all the info I can give you so If You Know Please Put In The Comments In Kinda New At This :D

item.title: Need help with my source
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

2nd tell us more about what happens when you try to run. surely this is not “all the info” you can give

Read full topic
